embed.error:
You are missing the `ManageGuild` permission!
Please contact an administrator to change the language!

embed.title: Would You - Support
embed.description: If you ever need help with anything, just contact the **support team** on our **[support server](https://discord.gg/vMyXAxEznS)!**

embed.text1: Would you want this power but

embed.title: Info
embed.description: **Would You** is a fun little bot for every server. Our mission is it to keep discord servers active by giving them a bunch of useless and useful powers to start a conversation.

Fields.name: **My Commands**
Fields.value:
`/wouldyou` -Start a discussion about random powers
`/ping` - Pong!
`/language` - Change the language of this server
`/help` - Shows this info
`/rather` - Gives you two powers to choose from
`/custom` - Sends a custom would you message in the chat!
`/wwyd` - Sends a what would you do question in the chat
`/support` - If you ever need help use this command to get help from the support team!
Fields.privacy: We value your privacy if you have any concers about your data check out privacy policy [here](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Developer-Dungeon-Studio/Would-You/main/PRIVACY-POLICY).

embed.title: Voting helps **Would You** gain more users! So make sure to vote every day!
